channel.title: Authors on Spyros Kyriazos
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Spyros Kyriazos

item.description:
I’m Spyros Kyriazos. I have a degree in Digital Systems and a Master’s Degree in Network-Oriented Systems. I work on smart home solutions, enterprise applications and video games.

I have experience with the following tools and technologies:

  • Smart Home: Home Assistant, Zigbee2MQTT, ESPHome
  • Java Libraries and Tools: JEE, JPA, Vaadin
  • Data: MySQL and Oracle, Apache DS, BIRT
  • Development Tools: Netbeans IDE, Eclipse IDE, Maven, Git, SVN
  • Game Development: Unreal Engine, jMonkeyEngine, Construct 2
